single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 25 decrease over next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 18 single_crochet stuff firmly round 26 decrease over next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 27 decrease around 6 single_crochet round 28 slip_stitch as needed around to close remaining gap and finish off weave in end wing make 2 chain 7 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 2 chain half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in next chain in last chain work 6 double_crochet working up the other side of the starting chain double_crochet in next chain then half_double_crochet in next chain single_crochet in next 2 chain and slip_stitch in last chain join with slip_stitch to first slip_stitch and finish off leaving a long end for sewing the wing to the body weave in other end tail chain 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next chain in last chain work 7 double_crochet working up the other side of the starting chain half_double_crochet in next chain single_crochet in last chain join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet and finish off leaving a long end for sewing the tail to the body weave in other end beak chain 4 join with slip_stitch to form ring round 1 6 single_crochet in ring 6 single_crochet do not join round 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 6 single_crochet turn right side out slip_stitch in next single_crochet and fasten_off leaving a long enough end to sew the beak to the body weave in the other end or use it to stuff the beak feet make 2 to start chain 9 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and next 2 chs 3 slip_stitch to make middle toe chain 4 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and next 2 chs 3 slip_stitch slip_stitch in the same chain as the last slip_stitch from first toe to make last toe chain 3 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and next chain 2 slip_stitch slip_stitch same chain as last sl sts from first two toes to finish slip_stitch in each chain back to the beginning of the starter chain 5 slip_stitch finish off leaving a tail long enough to sew foot to body weave in
